data.title: Partners
data.meta_description: VeriFone Holdings Inc.World leader in transaction automation systems. Founded in 1981, VeriFone delivered and implemented its payment
data.text:
Verifone with approx. 5.400 employees and $2.2 billions annual revenue (2015) is a leading global provider of technology that enables electronic payment transactions and value-added services at the point of sale. Since 1981, Verifone has designed and marketed system solutions that facilitate the long-term shift toward electronic payment transactions and away from cash and checks. Company has one of the leading electronic payment solutions brands and is one of the largest providers of electronic payment systems worldwide.

Verifone system solutions are able to process a wide range of payment cards: credit, debit, prepaid, gift, based on the technology of magnetic stripe, contact chip, contactless and EMV.

Verifone customers are primarily global financial institutions, payment processors, petroleum companies, large retailers, government organizations and healthcare companies, as well as independent sales organizations.

Verifone devices provide a platform for software developed by PROCARD.

THALES is a world leader in digital security. THALES provides end-to-end digital security solutions, from the development of software applications - to design and production of secure personal devices such as smart cards: contact, contactless and hybrid, smart card readers: contact and contactless, tokens, pin pads HSM-s.

More than a billion people worldwide use THALES products and services for telecommunications, financial services, e-Government, identity management, multimedia content, digital rights management, IT security, mass transit and many other applications.

THALES key figures: ca. â‚¬16,9 billions in 2021 revenue, over 80.000 employees in 68 countries.

Italian company CIM (Card Imaging Master) is a division of MF Group S.p.A. since 2005. CIM produces card printing, personalization and mailing equipment since 1985.

CIM offers high-quality products at ideal prices with services to meet any special requirement from the purchase of the printer to the post-sale service.

Both, the quality and the efficiency of CIM solutions brought the company to the leading position on the world market of printing, personalization and mailing equipment as well as resulted in customers' appreciation. Many prestigious banks, financial institutions, telecommunication companies, oil companies, government organizations and different clubs and associations in Europe, America and Asia rely on CIM machines. In Poland CIM provides its solutions for several years.
